resources.string: Pablo & Rosa Wedding at Bilbao City Hall

We want you to share with us a very special day, such as our wedding. Your presence is our gift.\n\nThrough the application, you will be able to see information about the event, details about the location of the ceremony, cocktail and restaurant, see the photos of the wedding and as well as add the songs that you like the most for the disco night.
Ernesto Erkoreka Plaza, 12, Bilbo \n \nPlace of ceremony in the Arab Room, Bilbao City Hall.
Trav. de Uribitarte, 1, Bilbao \n \nOnce the ceremony and photo session are over, a cocktail will take place where you can chat and share moments.
c/ Izartza Bidea, 48, Izartza (Sondika) \n\nFinally, dinner will take place in Sondika starting at 9:00 p.m. A disco session awaits us too!
Add the music you like the most to play on disco night! \n\nAmong all the songs, a selection will be made by the jury.

Here you can share and enjoy all the wedding photos. As a guest, you can upload the photos you take and see the rest of the moments so you don\'t miss a single one.\n\nThe service will be enabled on the day of the wedding.
The gallery is empty. Please add new photos
